item.title: Testing Some Pure HTML
item.description: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE html> Testing Some Pure HTML Testing Some Pure HTML with CSS 0 Introductory Matters For those that would prefer to read this document in a .pdf version, they can head over here. In that version I have some brief comments in this section about why one might want to prefer the .html version here rather than the .pdf. 0.2 Initial Caveats I am well-aware that the guidelines for the “Post-Tenure Review” process in the Policy Manual explicitly note (2.
